# asciiOnlyDigits(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a regular expression that matches only ASCII characters as digits.

## Declaration

```swift
func asciiOnlyDigits(_ useASCII: Bool = true) -> Regex<Regex<Output>.RegexOutput>
```

## Return Value

The modified regular expression.
